title: An answer to a scurrilous pamphlet intituled, Observations upon a compleat history of the lives and reignes of Mary, Queen of Scotland, and of her son, King James ... the libeller, without a name, set out by G. Bedell and T. Collins, two booksellers / but the history vindicated by the authour William Sanderson, Esq.
author: Sanderson, William, Sir, 1586?-1676.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for the author, and are to be sold by George Sawbridge, and Richard Tomlins,
